alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 2:26PM CDT until July 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... Green County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monticello to near Apple River, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, New Glarus, Monticello, Argyle, Wiota, South Wayne, Browntown, Gratiot, Juda, Avon, Jordan Center and Woodford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
